duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide critical care to patients in the Cardiac Care Unit (CCU), including monitoring vital signs, administering medication, and collaborating with the healthcare team.
Assess patient conditions and make clinical decisions, responding to emergencies and providing life-saving interventions as needed.
Communicate effectively with patients and their families, providing emotional support and clear explanations of treatments and procedures.
Maintain accurate patient records, ensuring compliance with medical protocols and regulations.
Collaborate with physicians and other healthcare professionals to optimize patient care and outcomes.
Remain attentive to patient needs and advocate for their well-being, demonstrating compassion and empathy in all interactions.

education_certification.credential: CCU Certification or Critical Care Nursing Certification
